en.purpose: Quickly confirm whether a patient is a suspected case of COVID-19, according to Chinese COVID-19 Diagnosis and Treatment Guideline (6th edition).
en.use: COVID-19 diagnosis and treatment decision support.

other_details.references: Chinese COVID-19 Diagnosis and Treatment Guideline (6th edition)

when: ($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Fever')||((($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Dry Cough')||($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Nasal Congestion'))||((($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Rhinorrhea')||($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Difficulty breathing'))||($gt0005|Symptom/Sign name|=='Pain in throat')))
($gt0021|Lab Test Conclusion|=='normal white cell count and low lymphocyte count')||($gt0021|Lab Test Conclusion|=='low white cell count and low lymphocyte count')

($gt0011|Imaging Exam Findings|=='Multiple ground glass opacities')||((($gt0011|Imaging Exam Findings|=='Mutiple small patchy shadows')||($gt0011|Imaging Exam Findings|=='Interstitial changes'))||(($gt0011|Imaging Exam Findings|=='Pulmonary consolidation')||($gt0011|Imaging Exam Findings|=='Infiltration')))
then: $gt0036|Imaging Exam Conclusion|='With imaging findings of COVID-19'
$gt0036|Imaging Exam Conclusion|='no imaging findings of COVID-19'

when: (($gt0039|Risk factor|=='History of travel to or residence in Wuhan and its surrounding areas, or in other communities where cases have been reported within 14 days prior to the onset of the disease')||($gt0039|Risk factor|=='In contact with novel coronavirus infected people (with positive results for the nucleic acid test) within 14 days prior to the onset of the disease'))||(($gt0039|Risk factor|=='In contact with patients who have fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan and its surrounding area, or from communities where confirmed cases have been reported within 14 days before the onset of the disease')||($gt0039|Risk factor|=='Clustered cases (2 or more cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms in a small area such families, offices, schools etc within 2 weeks)'))
$gt0039|Risk factor|!='History of travel to or residence in Wuhan and its surrounding areas, or in other communities where cases have been reported within 14 days prior to the onset of the disease'
$gt0039|Risk factor|!='In contact with novel coronavirus infected people (with positive results for the nucleic acid test) within 14 days prior to the onset of the disease'

$gt0039|Risk factor|!='In contact with patients who have fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan and its surrounding area, or from communities where confirmed cases have been reported within 14 days before the onset of the disease'
$gt0039|Risk factor|!='Clustered cases (2 or more cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms in a small area such families, offices, schools etc within 2 weeks)'

gt0001.description: Quickly confirm whether a patient is a suspected case of COVID-19, according to Chinese COVID-19 Diagnosis and Treatment Guideline (7th edition).

gt0005.description: The name of the reported symptom or sign.

gt0011.description: Narrative description of findings, including comparative findings.

gt0017.description: The level of confidence in the identification of the diagnosis.

gt0021.description: Narrative description of the key findings.

gt0036.description: Concise and clinically contextualised narrative interpretation of the imaging examination findings.

gt0039.description: The name of the risk factor.
